items.question: Can I cancel my order?
items.answer: You can cancel your order before it's shipped. Please use the order history in your account or contact us through the inquiry form.

items.question: Can I change my order?
items.answer: Before shipping, you can change quantities or add/remove items. Please contact us with your order number and requested changes.

items.question: Can I get a receipt?
items.answer: Yes, we can issue receipts. Please note this in the remarks field when ordering, or contact us through the inquiry form.

items.question: How much is shipping?
items.answer: Flat rate of Â¥750 (tax included) nationwide.

items.question: How long does delivery take?
items.answer: Orders are delivered approximately 2 weeks after confirmation.

items.question: Can I specify a delivery date and time?
items.answer: We apologize, but we currently do not support delivery date/time specification.

items.question: Do you ship internationally?
items.answer: Currently, we only ship within Japan. International shipping is planned for the future.

items.question: What payment methods are available?
items.answer: We accept credit cards (VISA, Mastercard, JCB, American Express).

items.question: Can I pay in installments?
items.answer: We only offer one-time payments. For installment plans, please check with your card company if they offer post-purchase conversion.

items.question: Can I return or exchange items?
items.answer: Returns and exchanges are accepted within 7 days of delivery for unused, unopened items. Shipping costs for customer-initiated returns are borne by the customer.

items.question: What if I receive a defective item?
items.answer: We sincerely apologize. Please contact us within 7 days of receiving the item. We will exchange or refund at our shipping expense.
